content.prompt: The authors discuss different scientists in the last two sentences of the passage primarily to

choices.label: explain why some sciences have advanced further than others
correct a misconception about the nature of scientific rationality
underscore that all scientific thought ultimately rests on observation
resolve an apparent contradiction between empiricism and experimentalism

skill.text: Skill 5.A: Describe the line of reasoning and explain whether it supports an argument's overarching thesis.
